Text:
[II] Let us invite Jesus Christ, our Redeemer, who is the way, the truth, and the life, saying:
[IR] Come, Lord, and stay with us!
[I1] Jesus, Son of the Most High, who was announced to the Virgin Mary by the angel Gabriel,
[I2] come reign over Your people forever.
[I1] You, Holy of God, for whom Your Forerunner leapt for joy in Elizabeth's womb,
[I2] come and give the joy of salvation to the whole universe.
[I1] Jesus the Savior, an angel revealed Your name to the righteous man Joseph,
[I2] come save Your people from their sins.
[I1] Light of the World, awaited for by Simeon and all the righteous,
[I2] come comfort us.
[I1] Star from on High, unfading light, whose coming Zechariah foretold, 
[I2] come shine upon all those who dwell in darkness and the shadow of death.
Changes: 2022-11-27 - Paul Prins: Initial translation of these intentions.
